name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, the first day of school in Shaoxing, luxury cars gathered at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Maoming, Guangdong, villagers pulled their cows to the city government to protest because their cowshed was demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 31, the Xujiahui branch of Shanghai Pacific Department Store officially closed down.
Employees bowed to customers at the door for the last time to express their gratitude.
The Pacific Department Store, which has been with Shanghai people for 30 years, has become history.
The staff revealed that the main reason for closing down the business was that the contract expired and the rent was not negotiated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2, Xuchang, Henan. The government has been in arrears of wages for more than 80 migrant workers for a year, and the migrant workers have been forced to use their real names on Weibo to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 2, a student movement broke out at Yongcheng No. 1 Middle School in Yongcheng City, Henan Province.
The school arbitrarily changed the holidays, canceled the "small week" for students, and changed the "big week" from two weeks off to three weeks off, which caused strong dissatisfaction among students.
At first, the students only protested by posting big-character posters, but they were covered up by the school, which eventually led to a large number of students gathering to the teaching building to protest. The students called it the "September 2 Uprising."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a "Escape from the British Museum" COSPLAY has been launched on Douyin. Internet celebrities COS themselves as girls who want to go home from the British Museum.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens believe that such behavior is actually objectifying women.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, the topic of "Rose Boy" is banned

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Gold Rush"
On September 1, a man went to a river in Zhoukoudian, Fangshan District, Beijing, and threw brass particles purchased online. He used the gimmick of "buying gold" to attract a large number of residents to "pan for gold" by the river, which lasted until late at night.
The police later filed a criminal case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 2, affected by the typhoon, the Luoding Reservoir in Guangdong began to release water, and all five gates released water, causing impacts on surrounding villages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contributions from netizens
An event was held at the September 18th Memorial Hall in Shenyang. Because it was broadcast live on CCTV, Shenyang University recruited students to participate. They were required to wear a white shirt, black pants, black shoes, and no hair dye at 8 a.m. on Sunday. As a result, almost no one was willing to go, and they used various reasons to passively resist.
In the end, the counselor announced that five people from each class would be forced to be selected, and the decision would be made by drawing lots.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Current water situation in Luoding City: Floodwaters have risen to the vicinity of Jiada Plaza

content: On August 29, Phoenix.com reported that two public officials in Bijie broke into a house and beat a 71-year-old man. The police station responded that it might be a fight between the two parties and they are investigating.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Under the news that Tesla is banned on Hangzhou elevated roads, many netizens support this action and believe that Tesla is a "spy car"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Public housing is coming
On September 1, Guangzhou Anju Group Co., Ltd. was established. The company is a municipal state-owned company in Guangzhou that is responsible for the investment, financing, construction and operation of affordable housing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens summarized the incident at Yongcheng No. 1 Middle School
There were students giving speeches at the scene, and some students were arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, as soon as the Henan Village Bank depositors arrived in Henan, they were surrounded by unidentified social personnel and detained in a local resort.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In addition, many netizens submitted a video saying that the reason why Tesla was banned from passing through Hangzhou elevated road was because a Tesla overtook the leader's motorcade that day, which caused concerns about security leaks. However, the uniforms of the traffic police in the video did not match the current season, so it is impossible to confirm whether it is related to this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, Zhengzhou, the owners of Kangqiao Xiangluwan went to the Yumi Building, a landmark building in Zhengzhou, to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, Zhengzhou, the owners of Kangqiao Xiangluwan went to the landmark Yumi Building in Zhengzhou to defend their rights. After intercepting the vehicle of Zhengzhou Mayor He Xiong, the owners knelt down and petitioned Mayor He.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
A netizen passed by Gubei No. 1 Community, which is known as the "No. 1 Luxury House in Puxi", and wanted to take a photo as a souvenir, but was illuminated by a laser pen from a security guard.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 31, the Beijing Intellectual Property Court made a ruling on the plagiarism case of Ye Yongqing, a famous Chinese contemporary artist, which lasted for 4 years. Ye Yongqing was required to immediately stop the infringement involved in the case, issue a statement to apologize to Sylvain, and pay RMB 5 million in compensation.
According to reports, Ye Yongqing plagiarized 87 works of Christian Sylvain over a period of more than 25 years. After infringing on about 66 works of Christian Sylvain, 82 paintings accused of infringement were auctioned, with an auction amount of up to RMB 42,268,396; two of the paintings auctioned were sold many times in the form of prints. According to the number of publications, it is presumed that Ye Yongqing illegally earned RMB 1,287,600; Christian Sylvain requested RMB 10,500,000 in compensation for the alleged infringing paintings formed after infringing 21 works of Christian Sylvain. The total amount of the above is RMB 54,055,996.
